title: Wordpress/Email Marketing VA
job_overview:
About Us
We’re a growing online education and membership company for artists and creatives. We offer courses, memberships, workshops, and digital products...supported by thoughtful systems, design-forward experiences, and seamless tech.

We’re looking for a creative tech VA who loves building clean, elegant backends, automations that flow, pages that convert, systems that scale. If you love solving problems, setting things up right the first time, and bringing a creative edge to everything you touch… we want to meet you.



The Role
This is a part-time, long-term position for someone with strong skills in WordPress/Elementor, Zapier, email marketing, and video content management. You’ll collaborate with our team to build and maintain our funnels, sales pages, websites, email flows, and course infrastructure.

We’re looking for someone who brings technical excellence + creative intuition to every project, with an eye for on-brand visuals and user-friendly flow.



Your Responsibilities
Build and update sales pages in Elementor/WordPress that match our brand

Set up and manage automated funnels using Zapier, SamCart, Flodesk, and WordPress

Upload, organize, and format course content in SamCart

Design and schedule email campaigns + sequences inside Flodesk

Manage and update our main website and podcast site (both Elementor/WordPress)

Assist in editing video content (cutting clips, polishing tutorials, uploading to platforms)

Maintain clean internal systems and help improve SOPs



You’re a Fit If:
You’re comfortable working across multiple platforms and can figure out integrations

You have an eye for design and care about alignment, spacing, brand consistency

You love creating elegant tech systems that just work

You’re proactive and independent—able to run with a task and ask smart questions

You enjoy improving systems and being a part of a growing business



Bonus Points If You Have:
Experience with SamCart, Flodesk, Elementor, Zapier, Buzzsprout

Basic video editing skills (e.g., iMovie, CapCut, Descript, etc.)

Past work in online education, coaching, or digital product businesses



Hours & Pay:
10 hours/week

$5.00/hour

1 year guaranteed raise

Paid lunch included


Don't apply if:
-you are not comfortable with a time tracker (Time Doctor or similar) that takes screenshots of your work day
You're not okay with this being a part time role



HOW TO APPLY: 
Email us at Upgrade to see actual info with the subject line "Tech and Creative Systems VA" to apply for this role.
